(See Sentence 9.10.9.3. for closures.)

Variation Sentence: The outdoor air supply duct required by Sentence 9.32.3.4. shall incorporate a flow-regulating damper.
Full Code Sentence: The outdoor air supply duct required by Sentence 9.32.3.5. shall incorporate a flow-regulating damper.

Variation Sentence: Where an exit is located in a house with a secondary suite including their common spaces, the exit shall be protected by a continuous smoke-tight barrier of not less than 12.7 mm thick gypsum board installed on both sides of walls separating the exit from the remainder of the building, and the underside of floor-ceiling framing separating the exit from the remainder of the building.
Full Code Sentence: Where an exit is located in a house with a secondary suite including their common spaces, the exit shall be protected by a continuous smoke-tight barrier of not less than 12.7 mm thick gypsum board installed on both sides of walls separating the exit from the remainder of the building, and the underside of floor-ceiling framing separating the exit from the remainder of the building. (See Sentence 9.10.9.3. for closures.)

Variation Sentence: Except for stairs with winders, where a flight of stairs within a dwelling unit consists of tapered treads, or a mix of tapered treads and rectangular treads, one handrail shall be installed along the narrow end of the treads.
Full Code Sentence: Except for stairs with winders, where a flight of stairs within a dwelling unit consists of tapered treads, or a mix of tapered treads and rectangular treads, one handrail shall be installed along the narrow end of the treads. (See Note A-9.8.7.2.)

Variation Sentence: The installation of manufactured and pre-assembled windows, doors and skylights and the field assembly of manufactured window and door combination units shall conform to the manufacturer s instructions.
Full Code Sentence: The installation of manufactured and pre-assembled windows, doors and skylights and the field assembly of manufactured window and door combination units shall conform to the manufacturer’s instructions.

Variation Sentence: Where flammable liquids or combustible liquids are present, electrical equipment shall conform to CSA C22.1-12 Canadian Electrical Code, Part I for hazardous locations. (See Notes A-4.1.4.1. and A-5.1.2.1.(1).)
Full Code Sentence: Where flammable liquids or combustible liquids are present, electrical equipment shall conform to CSA C22.1-12 Canadian Electrical Code, Part I for hazardous locations. (See Notes A-4.1.4.1.(1)and A-5.1.2.1.(1).)

Variation Sentence: The outdoor air supply duct required by Sentence 9.32.3.5. shall incorporate a flow-regulating damper.
Full Code Sentence: The outdoor air supply duct required by Sentence 9.32.3.4. shall incorporate a flow-regulating damper.

Variation Sentence: A non-heating-season mechanical ventilation system shall be designed and installed in conformance with good practice such as that described in the ASHRAE Handbooks and Standards, the HRAI SAR-G1 HRAI Digest the Hydronics Institute Manuals and the SMACNA manuals.
Full Code Sentence: A non-heating-season mechanical ventilation system shall be designed and installed in conformance with good practice such as that described in the ASHRAE Handbooks and Standards, the HRAI SAR-G1 HRAI Digest the Hydronics Institute Manuals and the SMACNA manuals. (See Note A-9.32.3.)

Variation Sentence: Except as permitted by Sentence 3.4.6.8.(10), the top of the nosing of stair treads shall have a rounded or beveled edge extending not less than 6 mm and not more than 13 mm measured horizontally from the front of the nosing.
Full Code Sentence: Except as permitted by Sentence 9.8.4.8.(2), the top of the nosings of stair treads shall have a rounded or beveled edge extending not less than 6 mm and not more than 14 mm measured horizontally from the front of the nosing.

Variation Sentence: Every residential occupancy shall incorporate provisions for non-heating-season ventilation in accordance with part 9., and except as required by Sentences 9.32.1.2. and 9.32.1.2.(3), if supplied with electrical power and a heating system, provisions for heating-season ventilation in accordance with Part 6.
Full Code Sentence: Every residential occupancy shall incorporate provisions for non-heating-season ventilation in accordance with Subsection 9.32.2., and except as required by Sentences 9.32.1.2.(2)and 9.32.1.2.(3), if supplied with electrical power and a heating system, provisions for heating-season ventilation in accordance with Part 6.

Variation Sentence: For the purpose of compliance with this Code as required in Sentence 1.2.1.1.(1), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 9.37.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)
Full Code Sentence: For the purpose of compliance with this Code as required in Clause 1.2.1.1.(1)(b), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 7.2.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)

Variation Sentence: For the purpose of compliance with this Code as required in Sentence 1.2.1.1.(1), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 9.37.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)
Full Code Sentence: For the purpose of compliance with this Code as required in Clause 1.2.1.1.(1)(b), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 5.10.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)

Variation Sentence: For the purposes of compliance with this Code as required in Sentence 1.2.1.1.(1), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 2.14.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)
Full Code Sentence: For the purposes of compliance with this Code as required in Clause 1.2.1.1.(1)(b), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 7.4.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)

Variation Sentence: For the purposes of compliance with this Code as required in Sentence 1.2.1.1.(1), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 2.14.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)
Full Code Sentence: For the purposes of compliance with this Code as required in Clause 1.2.1.1.(1)(b), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 5.7.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)

Variation Sentence: For the purpose of compliance with this Code as required in Sentence 1.2.1.1.(1), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 9.37.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)
Full Code Sentence: For the purpose of compliance with this Code as required in Clause 1.2.1.1.(1)(b), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 6.10.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)

Variation Sentence: For the purposes of compliance with this Code as required in Sentence 1.2.1.1.(1), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 2.14.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)
Full Code Sentence: For the purposes of compliance with this Code as required in Clause 1.2.1.1.(1)(b), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 3.4.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)

Variation Sentence: For the purposes of compliance with this Code as required in Sentence 1.2.1.1.(1), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 2.14.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)
Full Code Sentence: For the purposes of compliance with this Code as required in Clause 1.2.1.1.(1)(b), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 6.9.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)

Variation Sentence: For the purpose of compliance with this Code as required in Sentence 1.2.1.1.(1), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 9.37.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)
Full Code Sentence: For the purpose of compliance with this Code as required in Clause 1.2.1.1.(1)(b), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 3.10.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)

Variation Sentence: For the purpose of compliance with this Code as required in Sentence 1.2.1.1.(1), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 9.37.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)
Full Code Sentence: For the purpose of compliance with this Code as required in Clause 1.2.1.1.(1)(b), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 8.3.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)

Variation Sentence: A building conforming to Article 3.2.2.58. shall not contain a Group A, Division 1 or 3, Group B, or Group F, Division 1 major occupancy, or except as provided in Sentence 3.1.3.2.(5), a Group A, Division 2, Group E, or Group F, Division 2 or 3 major occupancy above the second storey.
Full Code Sentence: A building conforming to Article 3.2.2.50. shall not contain except as provided in Sentence 3.1.3.2.(5), a Group A, Division 1 or 3, Group B, or Group F, Division 2 or 3 major occupancy, or a Group A, Division 2 or Group E major occupancy above the second storey. (See Note A-3.1.3.2. to .)

Variation Sentence: Materials, design, construction and installation of windows, doors and skylights that separate conditioned space from unconditioned space or the exterior but that are not covered in the scope of CSA AAMA/WDMA/CSA 101/I.S.2/A440-11 NAFS North American Fenestration Standard/Specification for Windows, Doors, and Skylights shall conform to the remainder of this Subsection or part 9., and the applicable requirements in part 9., or to Part 5.
Full Code Sentence: Materials, design, construction and installation of windows, doors and skylights that separate conditioned space from unconditioned space or the exterior but that are not covered in the scope of CSA AAMA/WDMA/CSA 101/I.S.2/A440-11 NAFS – North American Fenestration Standard/Specification for Windows, Doors, and Skylights shall conform to the remainder of this Subsection or Subsection 9.7.4., and the applicable requirements in Subsection 9.7.6., or to Part 5.

Variation Sentence: For each suite of residential occupancy that shares a wall or floor/ceiling assembly with a storage garage or that is adjacent to an attic or crawl space to which the storage garage is also adjacent, a CO alarm shall be installed inside each bedroom, or outside each bedroom, within 5 m of each bedroom door, measured following corridors and doorways.
Full Code Sentence: For each suite of residential occupancy or suite of care occupancy that shares a wall or floor/ceiling assembly with a storage garage or that is adjacent to an attic or crawl space to which the storage garage is also adjacent, a CO alarm shall be installed inside each bedroom, or outside each bedroom, within 5 m of each bedroom door, measured following corridors and doorways.

Variation Sentence: The use of stainless steel pipe and tube shall conform to Table 2.2.6.16.
Full Code Sentence: The use of stainless steel pipe and tube shall conform to Table 2.2.6.15.

Variation Sentence: Where mechanical, plumbing or electrical system components, such as pipes, ducts, conduits, cabinets, chases, panels or recessed heaters, are placed within and parallel to a wall assembly required to be insulated, the effective thermal resistance of that wall at the projected area of the system component shall be not less than that required by Tables 9.36.2.6.-A , 9.36.2.6.-B , 9.36.2.8.-A and 9.36.2.8.-B (See Note A-9.36.2.5.(6).)
Full Code Sentence: Where mechanical, plumbing or electrical system components, such as pipes, ducts, conduits, cabinets, chases, panels or recessed heaters, are placed within and parallel to a wall assembly required to be insulated, the effective thermal resistance of that wall at the projected area of the system component shall be not less than that required by Tables 9.36.2.6.-A, 9.36.2.6.-B, 9.36.2.8.-Aand 9.36.2.8.-B (See Note A-9.36.2.5.(6).)

Variation Sentence: Windows, doors and skylights shall conform to the performance grades selected in Sentence 5.9.2.2. when tested in accordance with the Harmonized Standard referenced in Sentence 5.9.2.2.(1).
Full Code Sentence: Windows, doors and skylights shall conform to the performance grades selected in Sentence 9.7.4.3. when tested in accordance with the Harmonized Standard referenced in Clause 9.7.4.2.(1)(a).

Variation Sentence: Windows, doors and skylights shall conform to the performance grades selected in Sentence 9.7.4.3. when tested in accordance with the Harmonized Standard referenced in Sentence 9.7.4.2.(1).
Full Code Sentence: Windows, doors and skylights shall conform to the performance grades selected in Sentence 5.9.2.2. when tested in accordance with the Harmonized Standard referenced in Clause 5.9.2.2.(1)(a).

Variation Sentence: The climatic and seismic values required for the design of buildings under this Code shall be in conformance with the values established by the authority having jurisdiction or, in the absence of such data, with Sentence 1.1.3.1. and the climatic and seismic values in Appendix C. (See Note A-1.1.3.1.(1).)
Full Code Sentence: The climatic and seismic values required for the design of buildings under this Code shall be in conformance with the values established by the authority having jurisdiction or, in the absence of such data, with Sentence 1.1.3.1. and the climatic and seismic values in . (See Note A-1.1.3.1.(1).) (See Note A-1.1.3.1.(1).)

Variation Sentence: Exhaust air intakes for principal ventilation fans located in kitchens, bathrooms and water-closet rooms shall be located in the ceiling or on the wall not less than 2 m above the floor. (See Note A-9.32.3.3.(10).)
Full Code Sentence: Exhaust air intakes for principal ventilation fans located in kitchens, bathrooms and water-closet rooms shall be located in the ceiling or on the wall not less than 2 m above the floor. (See Note A-9.32.3.3.(10).) (See Note A-9.32.3.4.)

Variation Sentence: Except as provided in Article 9.8.4.7. and except for stairs serving areas only used as service rooms or service spaces, the rise, which is measured as the vertical nosing-to-nosing distance, shall comply with Table 9.8.4.1.
Full Code Sentence: Except as provided in Article 9.8.4.7. and except for stairs serving areas only used as service rooms or service spaces, the rise, which is measured as the vertical nosing-to-nosing distance, shall comply with Table 9.8.4.1. (See Note A-9.8.4.)

Variation Sentence: Where a public corridor is located in a house with a secondary suite, a continuous smoke-tight barrier of not less than 12.7 mm thick gypsum board shall be installed on both sides of walls separating the corridor from the remainder of the building, and the underside of floor-ceiling framing separating the corridor from the remainder of the building.
Full Code Sentence: Where a public corridor is located in a house with a secondary suite, a continuous smoke-tight barrier of not less than 12.7 mm thick gypsum board shall be installed on both sides of walls separating the corridor from the remainder of the building, and the underside of floor-ceiling framing separating the corridor from the remainder of the building. (See Sentence 9.10.9.3. for closures.)

Variation Sentence: Every counter more than 2 m long at which the public is served shall comply with part 3. (See Note A-3.8.2.11.(1).) (See also Note A-3.8.2.3.)
Full Code Sentence: Every counter more than 2 m long at which the public is served shall comply with Subsection 3.8.3. (See Note A-3.8.2.11.(1).) (See also Note A-3.8.2.3.)

Variation Sentence: Except where the size of a duct can be determined using Table 9.32.3.11.-A or Table 9.32.3.11.-B, duct sizes shall be determined according to part 9.
Full Code Sentence: Except where the size of a duct can be determined using Table 9.32.3.11.-A or Table 9.32.3.11.-B, duct sizes shall be determined according to Subsection 9.33.4.

Variation Sentence: Except as permitted in Sentences 3.2.4.1. and 3.2.4.1.(3), a fire alarm system shall be installed in buildings in which an automatic sprinkler system is installed.
Full Code Sentence: Except as permitted in Sentences 3.2.4.1.(2)and 3.2.4.1.(3), a fire alarm system shall be installed in buildings in which an automatic sprinkler system is installed.

Variation Sentence: If a non-flammable medical gas piping system is installed, it shall be installed in conformance with CSA Z7396.1-12 Medical Gas Pipeline Systems Part 1: Pipelines for Medical Gases, Medical Vacuum, Medical Support Gases, and Anaesthetic Gas Scavenging Systemsand Part 3 of Division B of the NFC.
Full Code Sentence: If a non-flammable medical gas piping system is installed, it shall be installed in conformance with CSA Z7396.1-12 Medical Gas Pipeline Systems – Part 1: Pipelines for Medical Gases, Medical Vacuum, Medical Support Gases, and Anaesthetic Gas Scavenging Systemsand Part 3 of Division B of the NFC. (See Note A-3.8.)

Variation Sentence: At a barrier-free entrance that includes more than one doorway, only one of the doorways is required to be designed in accordance with part 3.
Full Code Sentence: At a barrier-free entrance that includes more than one doorway, only one of the doorways is required to be designed in accordance with Subsection 3.8.3.

Variation Sentence: Doorways serving a single dwelling unit or a house with a secondary suite need not comply with Sentences 9.9.6.2. and 9.9.6.2.(2). (See also Article 9.5.5.1.)
Full Code Sentence: Doorways serving a single dwelling unit or a house with a secondary suite need not comply with Sentences 9.9.6.2.(1)and 9.9.6.2.(2). (See also Article 9.5.5.1.)

Variation Sentence: The space above a mezzanine conforming to Sentence 3.2.1.1. is permitted to include an enclosed space whose area does not exceed 10% of the open area of the room in which the mezzanine is located provided the enclosed space does not obstruct visual communication between the open space above the mezzanine and the room in which it is located. (See Note A-3.2.1.1.(3)(a).)
Full Code Sentence: The space above a mezzanine conforming to Sentence 9.10.4.1. is permitted to include an enclosed space whose area does not exceed 10% of the open area of the room in which the mezzanine is located, provided the enclosed space does not obstruct visual communication between the open space above the mezzanine and the room in which it is located.

Variation Sentence: Except as permitted in Sentence 3.2.4.20.(13), a manually operated silencing device shall be incorporated within the circuitry of a smoke alarm installed in a dwelling unit so that it will silence the signal emitted by the smoke alarm for a period of not more than 10 min, after which the smoke alarm will reset and again sound the alarm if the level of smoke in the vicinity is sufficient to reactuate the smoke alarm.
Full Code Sentence: Except as permitted in Sentence 9.10.19.6.(2), a manually operated device shall be incorporated within the circuitry of a smoke alarm installed in a dwelling unit so that the signal emitted by the smoke alarm can be silenced for a period of not more than 10 min, after which the smoke alarm will reset and sound again if the level of smoke in the vicinity is sufficient to re-actuate it.

Variation Sentence: Except as permitted by Sentences 3.2.4.16. and 3.2.4.16.(3), where a fire alarm system is installed, a manual station shall be installed in every floor area near every principal entrance to the building, and every exit.
Full Code Sentence: Except as permitted by Sentences 3.2.4.16.(2)and 3.2.4.16.(3), where a fire alarm system is installed, a manual station shall be installed in every floor area near every principal entrance to the building, and every exit. (See Note A-3.2.4.16.(1).)

Variation Sentence: Before being placed in service, every elevator, escalator or dumbwaiter installation, including safety and control devices, shall be inspected and tested in accordance with provincial or territorial regulations or municipal bylaws, or ASME/CSA ASME A17.1-2010/CSA B44-10 Safety Code for Elevators and Escalators in the absence of the regulations or bylaws referred to in Sentence 3.5.2.1.(2). (See Note A-3.5.2.1.(1).)
Full Code Sentence: Before being placed in service, every elevator, escalator or dumbwaiter installation, including safety and control devices, shall be inspected and tested in accordance with provincial or territorial regulations or municipal bylaws, or ASME/CSA ASME A17.1-2010/CSA B44-10 Safety Code for Elevators and Escalators in the absence of the regulations or bylaws referred to in Clause 3.5.2.1.(2)(a). (See Note A-3.5.2.1.(1).) (See Note A-3.5.2.1.(1).)

Variation Sentence: Drains, overflows and blow-downs shall be connected to the building s drainage system in accordance with Clause 2.4.2.1.(1) of Division B of the NPC.
Full Code Sentence: Drains, overflows and blow-downs shall be connected to the building’s drainage system in accordance with Clause 2.4.2.1.(1) of Division B of the NPC.

Variation Sentence: Except as provided in Sentence 7.1.1.2.(2), fire emergency systems required to be installed in buildings in conformance with Subsection 3.2.6. of Division B of the NBC shall be tested in conformance with Sections 7. and 7.
Full Code Sentence: Except as provided in Sentence 7.1.1.2.(2), fire emergency systems required to be installed in buildings in conformance with Subsection 3.2.6. of Division B of the NBC shall be tested in conformance with Sections 7.2.and 7.3.

Variation Sentence: The route from the escalator or inclined moving walk to the barrier-free path of travel that leads from floor to floor as required by Sentence 3.8.2.4. shall be clearly indicated by appropriate signs.
Full Code Sentence: The route from the escalator or inclined moving walk to the barrier-free path of travel that leads from floor to floor as required by Sentence 3.8.2.4. shall be clearly indicated by appropriate signs. (See Note A-3.8.2.5.)

Variation Sentence: The total lateral earthquake design force, Vs, shall be distributed over the height of the building in accordance with the following formula: Fx=VsWxhx/i=1nWihiwhereFx = force applied through the centre of mass at level x, Wx, Wi portion of W that is located at or is assigned to level x or i respectively, and hx, hi = height, in m, above the base of level x and level i as per Article 4.1.8.2.
Full Code Sentence: The total lateral earthquake design force, Vs, shall be distributed over the height of the building in accordance with the following formula: Fx=VsWxhx/i=1nWihiwhereFx= force applied through the centre of mass at level x, Wx, Wiportion of W that is located at or is assigned to level x or i respectively, and hx, hi= height, in m, above the base of level x and level i as per Article 4.1.8.2.

Variation Sentence: Except as permitted in Sentences 9.10.18.2. and 9.10.18.2.(4), a fire alarm system shall be installed in buildings in which a sprinkler system is installed.
Full Code Sentence: Except as permitted in Sentences 9.10.18.2.(3)and 9.10.18.2.(4), a fire alarm system shall be installed in buildings in which a sprinkler system is installed.

Variation Sentence: Except as permitted by Sentences 3.2.2.7. and 3.2.2.7.(4), a building classified as Group F, Division 3 is permitted to conform to Sentence 3.2.2.82. provided except as permitted by Sentences 3.2.2.7. and 3.2.2.18.(2), the building is sprinklered throughout, it is not more than 6 storeys in building height, and it has a building area that is not limited if the building is not more than 1 storey in building height, not more than 21 600 m2 if 2 storeys in building height, not more than 14 400 m2 if 3 storeys in building height, not more than 10 800 m2 if 4 storeys in building height, not more than 8 640 m2 if 5 storeys in building height, or not more than 7 200 m2 if 6 storeys in building height.
Full Code Sentence: A building classified as Group D is permitted to conform to Sentence 3.2.2.57. provided except as permitted by Sentences 3.2.2.7.(1)and 3.2.2.18.(2), the building is sprinklered throughout, it is not more than 6 storeys in building height, and it has a building area that is not limited if the building is not more than 2 storeys in building height, not more than 14 400 m2 if 3 storeys in building height, not more than 10 800 m2 if 4 storeys in building height, not more than 8 640 m2 if 5 storeys in building height, or not more than 7 200 m2 if 6 storeys in building height.

Variation Sentence: Where ancillary spaces described in Sentence 9.32.1.2. contain exhaust devices, these spaces shall be provided with make-up air in accordance with Article 9.32.3.8.
Full Code Sentence: Where ancillary spaces described in Clause 9.32.1.2.(3) contain exhaust devices, these spaces shall be provided with make-up air in accordance with Article 9.32.3.8.

Variation Sentence: For guards within dwelling units and within houses with a secondary suite including their common spaces and for exterior guards serving not more than 2 dwelling units , Table 9.8.8.2. need not apply where the guard construction used has been demonstrated to provide effective performance.
Full Code Sentence: For guards within dwelling unitsand within houses with a secondary suite including their common spaces and for exterior guards serving not more than 2 dwelling units, Table 9.8.8.2. need not apply where the guard construction used has been demonstrated to provide effective performance. (See Note A-9.8.8.3.)

Variation Sentence: The height of buildings intended for the storage of ammonium nitrate shall conform to Sentence 3.3.6.6. of Division B of the NBC.
Full Code Sentence: The occupancy classification of buildings intended for the storage of ammonium nitrate shall conform to Sentence 3.3.6.6. of Division B of the NBC.

Variation Sentence: The occupancy classification of buildings intended for the storage of ammonium nitrate shall conform to Sentence 3.3.6.6. of Division B of the NBC.
Full Code Sentence: The height of buildings intended for the storage of ammonium nitrate shall conform to Sentence 3.3.6.6. of Division B of the NBC.

Variation Sentence: A building conforming to Article 3.2.2.58. shall not contain a Group A, Division 1 or 3, Group B, or Group F, Division 1 major occupancy, or except as provided in Sentence 3.1.3.2.(5), a Group A, Division 2, Group E, or Group F, Division 2 or 3 major occupancy above the second storey.
Full Code Sentence: A building conforming to Article 3.2.2.58. shall not contain a Group A, Division 1 or 3, Group B, or Group F, Division 1 major occupancy, or except as provided in Sentence 3.1.3.2.(5), a Group A, Division 2, Group E, or Group F, Division 2 or 3 major occupancy above the second storey. (See Note A-3.1.3.2. to .)

Variation Sentence: A counter that is used in a cafeteria, or one that performs a similar function whereat movement takes place parallel to the counter, need not provide a knee space underneath it.
Full Code Sentence: A counter that is used in a cafeteria, or one that performs a similar function whereat movement takes place parallel to the counter, need not provide a knee space underneath it. (See Note A-3.8.3.20.)

Variation Sentence: When a building is erected over existing buried flammable gas mains, such service lines shall be encased in gas-tight conduits in conformance with CSA CAN/CSA-Z662-15 Oil and Gas Pipeline Systems
Full Code Sentence: When a building is erected over existing buried flammable gas mains, such service lines shall be encased in gas-tight conduits in conformance with CSA CAN/CSA-Z662-15 Oil and Gas Pipeline Systems (See Note A-3.2.4.)

Variation Sentence: Exits are not required directly from rooftop enclosures that are provided with access to exits in conformance with Sentences 3.3.1.3. and 3.3.1.3.(6).
Full Code Sentence: Exits are not required directly from rooftop enclosures that are provided with access to exits in conformance with Sentences 3.3.1.3.(5)and 3.3.1.3.(6).

Variation Sentence: Where a construction projects over the top of the drained and vented air space described in Sentence 9.27.2.2. or over the drainage material described in Sentence 9.27.2.2.(1), the air space or drainage material shall not be contiguous with concealed spaces in the projecting construction.
Full Code Sentence: Where a construction projects over the top of the drained and vented air space described in Clause 9.27.2.2.(1) or over the drainage material described in Clause 9.27.2.2.(1)(b), the air space or drainage material shall not be contiguous with concealed spaces in the projecting construction.

Variation Sentence: Internal combustion engines used to power supplementary blowers required by the NBC shall be operated and maintained in conformance with part 6.
Full Code Sentence: Internal combustion engines used to power supplementary blowers required by the NBC shall be operated and maintained in conformance with Section 6.5.

Variation Sentence: The location and protection of windows, doors and skylights in order to control the spread of fire shall conform to part 9.
Full Code Sentence: The location and protection of windows, doors and skylights in order to control the spread of fire shall conform to Subsection 9.10.12.

Variation Sentence: Except as required by Sentence 3.2.1.1.(5), the space above a mezzanine need not be considered as a storey in calculating the building height, provided the aggregate area of mezzanines that are not superimposed does not exceed 40% of the open area of the room in which they are located (see Note A-3.2.1.1.(3)(a)), and except as permitted in Sentences 3.2.1.1. and 3.3.2.13.(3), the space above the mezzanine is used as an open area without partitions or subdividing walls higher than 1 070 mm above the mezzanine floor.
Full Code Sentence: Except as required by Sentence 9.10.4.2.(1), the space above a mezzanine is permitted to be excluded from the calculation of building height, provided the aggregate area of mezzanines that are not superimposed does not exceed 40% of the open area of the room in which they are located (see Note A-3.2.1.1.(3)(a)), and except as permitted in Sentence 9.10.4.1.(3), the space above the mezzanine floor is used as an open area without partitions or subdividing walls higher than 1 070 mm above the mezzanine floor.

Variation Sentence: Not less than 90% of the exterior cladding on each exterior wall of buildings conforming to Article 3.2.2.50. or 3.2.2.58. shall consist of noncombustible cladding, or a wall assembly that satisfies the criteria of Clause 3.1.5.5.(1)(b). (See also Notes A-3.1.5.5.(1)(b) and A-3.1.5.5.(1)(b)(ii).)
Full Code Sentence: Not less than 90% of the exterior cladding on each exterior wall of buildings conforming to Article 3.2.2.50.or 3.2.2.58. shall consist of noncombustible cladding, or a wall assembly that satisfies the criteria of Clause 3.1.5.5.(1)(b). (See Note A-3.1.4.8.(1).) (See also Notes A-3.1.5.5.(1)(b)(i)and A-3.1.5.5.(1)(b)(ii).)

Variation Sentence: This Subsection applies to buildings that contain only dwelling units and have no dwelling unit above another dwelling unit, and houses with a secondary suite including their common spaces.
Full Code Sentence: This Subsection applies to buildings that contain only dwelling units and have no dwelling unit above another dwelling unit, and houses with a secondary suite including their common spaces. (See Note A-9.10.15.1.(1).)

Variation Sentence: A building conforming to Article 3.2.2.50. shall not contain except as provided in Sentence 3.1.3.2.(5), a Group A, Division 1 or 3, Group B, or Group F, Division 2 or 3 major occupancy, or a Group A, Division 2 or Group E major occupancy above the second storey.
Full Code Sentence: A building conforming to Article 3.2.2.50. shall not contain except as provided in Sentence 3.1.3.2.(5), a Group A, Division 1 or 3, Group B, or Group F, Division 2 or 3 major occupancy, or a Group A, Division 2 or Group E major occupancy above the second storey. (See Note A-3.1.3.2. to .)

Variation Sentence: Except as provided in Sentences 2.2.6.8. and 2.2.6.8.(3), welded and seamless steel pipe shall not be used in a plumbing system.
Full Code Sentence: Except as provided in Sentences 2.2.6.7. and 2.2.6.7.(3), welded and seamless steel pipe shall not be used in a plumbing system.

Variation Sentence: Except as provided in Sentence 9.8.7.4. and Sentence 3.8.3.5. , required handrails shall be 865 mm to 1 070 mm high.
Full Code Sentence: Except as provided in Sentence 9.8.7.4. and Clause 3.8.3.5.(1)(e), required handrails shall be 865 mm to 1 070 mm high.

Variation Sentence: A building that is wholly constructed in accordance with the building area and construction requirements of Article 3.2.2.58. shall not contain Group A, Division 2, Group E, and Group F, Division 2 or 3 major occupancies above the second storey, or a storage garage above the third storey (see also Sentence 4.4.2.1.(1)).
Full Code Sentence: A building that is wholly constructed in accordance with the building area and construction requirements of Article 3.2.2.50. shall not contain Group A, Division 2 and Group E major occupancies above the second storey, or a storage garage above the third storey (see also Sentence 4.4.2.1.(1)).

Variation Sentence: Provision shall be made for the free flow of air to or from all rooms by leaving gaps beneath doors, using louvred doors or installing grilles in doors.
Full Code Sentence: Provision shall be made for the free flow of air to or from all rooms by leaving gaps beneath doors, using louvred doors or installing grilles in doors. (See Note A-9.32.3.6.)

Variation Sentence: Where outdoor air is to be introduced to the dwelling unit through means other than a forced air heating system, the provision of outdoor air shall comply with this Article.
Full Code Sentence: Where outdoor air is to be introduced to the dwelling unit through a forced air heating system, the provision of outdoor air shall comply with this Article.

Variation Sentence: For the purposes of compliance with this Code as required in Sentence 1.2.1.1.(1), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 2.14.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)
Full Code Sentence: For the purpose of compliance with this Code as required in Clause 1.2.1.1.(1)(b), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 8.3.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)

Variation Sentence: For the purposes of compliance with this Code as required in Sentence 1.2.1.1.(1), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 2.14.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)
Full Code Sentence: For the purpose of compliance with this Code as required in Clause 1.2.1.1.(1)(b), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 5.10.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)

Variation Sentence: Where outdoor air is to be introduced to the dwelling unit through a forced air heating system, the provision of outdoor air shall comply with this Article.
Full Code Sentence: Where outdoor air is to be introduced to the dwelling unit through means other than a forced air heating system, the provision of outdoor air shall comply with this Article.

Variation Sentence: For the purpose of compliance with this Code as required in Sentence 1.2.1.1.(1), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 9.37.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)
Full Code Sentence: For the purposes of compliance with this Code as required in Clause 1.2.1.1.(1)(b), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 7.4.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)

Variation Sentence: For the purpose of compliance with this Code as required in Sentence 1.2.1.1.(1), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 9.37.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)
Full Code Sentence: For the purposes of compliance with this Code as required in Clause 1.2.1.1.(1)(b), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 3.4.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)

Variation Sentence: The requirement for handrails in Sentence 3.8.3.5. need not apply to a ramp serving as an aisle for fixed seating.
Full Code Sentence: The requirement for handrails in Clause 3.8.3.5.(1) need not apply to a ramp serving as an aisle for fixed seating.

Variation Sentence: For the purpose of compliance with this Code as required in Sentence 1.2.1.1.(1), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 9.37.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)
Full Code Sentence: For the purposes of compliance with this Code as required in Clause 1.2.1.1.(1)(b), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 6.9.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)

Variation Sentence: For the purposes of compliance with this Code as required in Sentence 1.2.1.1.(1), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 2.14.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)
Full Code Sentence: For the purpose of compliance with this Code as required in Clause 1.2.1.1.(1)(b), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 7.2.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)

Variation Sentence: For the purposes of compliance with this Code as required in Sentence 1.2.1.1.(1), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 2.14.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)
Full Code Sentence: For the purpose of compliance with this Code as required in Clause 1.2.1.1.(1)(b), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 3.10.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)

Variation Sentence: Where acceptable solutions are referred to in Division B, they shall be the provisions stated in Parts 3 to 9.
Full Code Sentence: Where acceptable solutions are referred to in Division B, they shall be the provisions stated in Parts 2 to 7.

Variation Sentence: For the purpose of compliance with this Code as required in Sentence 1.2.1.1.(1), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 9.37.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)
Full Code Sentence: For the purposes of compliance with this Code as required in Clause 1.2.1.1.(1)(b), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 5.7.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)

Variation Sentence: For the purpose of compliance with this Code as required in Sentence 1.2.1.1.(1), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 9.37.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)
Full Code Sentence: For the purposes of compliance with this Code as required in Clause 1.2.1.1.(1)(b), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 2.14.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)

Variation Sentence: For the purposes of compliance with this Code as required in Sentence 1.2.1.1.(1), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 2.14.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)
Full Code Sentence: For the purpose of compliance with this Code as required in Clause 1.2.1.1.(1)(b), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 6.10.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)

Variation Sentence: The energy model calculations shall account for the effect of airtightness in accordance with Sentence 9.36.5.10. or 9.36.5.10.(11), as applicable.
Full Code Sentence: The energy model calculations shall account for the effect of airtightness in accordance with Sentence 9.36.5.10.(10)or 9.36.5.10.(11), as applicable.

Variation Sentence: Windows and doors installed to provide the required access to a building for firefighting purposes shall conform to part 9.
Full Code Sentence: Windows and doors installed to provide the required access to a building for firefighting purposes shall conform to Subsection 9.10.20.

Variation Sentence: The heating-season ventilation required by Sentence 9.32.1.2. shall be provided by a mechanical ventilation system complying with good practice such as that described in CSA CAN/CSA-F326-M91 Residential Mechanical Ventilation Systems for dwelling units with 5 or fewer bedrooms, the balance of this Subsection, or Part 6.
Full Code Sentence: The heating-season ventilation required by Clause 9.32.1.2.(1) shall be provided by a mechanical ventilation system complying with good practice such as that described in CSA CAN/CSA-F326-M91 Residential Mechanical Ventilation Systems for dwelling units with 5 or fewer bedrooms, the balance of this Subsection, or Part 6. (See Note A-9.32.3.1.(1).)

Variation Sentence: The design, construction, installation and alteration of every elevator, escalator and dumbwaiter shall conform to provincial or territorial regulations or municipal bylaws, or ASME/CSA ASME A17.1-2010/CSA B44-10 Safety Code for Elevators and Escalators in the absence of the regulations or bylaws referred to in Sentence 3.5.2.1.(1).
Full Code Sentence: The design, construction, installation and alteration of every elevator, escalator and dumbwaiter shall conform to provincial or territorial regulations or municipal bylaws, or ASME/CSA ASME A17.1-2010/CSA B44-10 Safety Code for Elevators and Escalators in the absence of the regulations or bylaws referred to in Clause 3.5.2.1.(1)(a). (See Note A-3.5.2.1.(1).)

Variation Sentence: Except as provided in Sentence 3.9.2.2.(3), the spatial separation requirements in part 3. shall apply to self-service storage buildings.
Full Code Sentence: Except as provided in Sentence 3.9.2.2.(3), the spatial separation requirements in Subsection 3.2.3. shall apply to self-service storage buildings.

Variation Sentence: Any tempering device installed to comply with Sentence 9.32.3.5. shall be installed in accordance with Articles 9.33.4.1. and 9.33.5.2.
Full Code Sentence: Any tempering device installed to comply with Sentence 9.32.3.5. shall be installed in accordance with Articles 9.33.4.1.and 9.33.5.2.

Variation Sentence: Except as permitted by Sentence 9.8.5.3.(2), the clear height over ramps shall be not less than 2 050 mm.
Full Code Sentence: Except as permitted by Sentence 9.8.6.4.(2), the clear height over landings shall be not less than 2 050 mm.

Variation Sentence: For the purpose of compliance with this Code as required in Sentence 1.2.1.1.(1), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in Division B shall be the objectives and functional statements identified in 3.10., 4.5., 5.10., 6.4., 7.2., 8.3. and 9.37.(See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)
Full Code Sentence: For the purpose of compliance with this Code as required in Clause 1.2.1.1.(1)(b), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in Division B shall be the objectives and functional statements identified in Sections 3.10., 4.5., 5.10., 6.4., 7.2., 8.3. and 9.37. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)

Variation Sentence: Where a wired glass assembly is installed in a required fire separation, it need not conform to the requirements of this Subsection. (See Note A-5.9.2.1.(3).)
Full Code Sentence: Where a wired glass assembly is installed in a required fire separation, it need not conform to the requirements of this Subsection. (See Note A-5.9.2.1.(3).) (See Note A-5.9.2.2.)

Variation Sentence: Except as permitted by Sentences 3.2.2.7. and 3.2.2.7.(4), a building classified as Group F, Division 3 is permitted to conform to Sentence 3.2.2.82. provided except as permitted by Sentences 3.2.2.7. and 3.2.2.18.(2), the building is sprinklered throughout, it is not more than 6 storeys in building height, and it has a building area that is not limited if the building is not more than 1 storey in building height, not more than 21 600 m2 if 2 storeys in building height, not more than 14 400 m2 if 3 storeys in building height, not more than 10 800 m2 if 4 storeys in building height, not more than 8 640 m2 if 5 storeys in building height, or not more than 7 200 m2 if 6 storeys in building height.
Full Code Sentence: A building classified as Group F, Division 3 is permitted to conform to Sentence 3.2.2.84. provided except as permitted by Sentences 3.2.2.7.(1)and 3.2.2.18.(2), the building is sprinklered throughout, it is not more than 4 storeys in building height, and it has a building area not more than 14 400 m2 if 1 storey in building height, 7 200 m2 if 2 storeys in building height, 4 800 m2 if 3 storeys in building height, or 3 600 m2 if 4 storeys in building height.

Variation Sentence: Where a supplemental exhaust fan required by this Article is controlled by a dehumidistat or other automatic control in addition to the manual switch required by Sentence 9.32.3.5.(6), the manual switch shall be capable of activating the fan regardless of the setting of the automatic control.
Full Code Sentence: Where the principal ventilation fan is controlled by a dehumidistat or other automatic control in addition to the manual switch required by Sentence 9.32.3.3.(5), the manual switch shall be capable of activating the fan regardless of the setting of the automatic control.

Variation Sentence: A self-contained heating-season ventilation system serving a single dwelling unit shall comply with part 9. (See Note A-9.32.1.2.(2).)
Full Code Sentence: A self-contained heating-season ventilation system serving a single dwelling unit shall comply with Subsection 9.32.3. (See Note A-9.32.1.2.(2).)

Variation Sentence: If a walkway or pedestrian bridge connects two barrier-free storeys in different buildings, the path of travel from one storey to the other storey by means of the walkway or bridge shall be barrier-free.
Full Code Sentence: If a walkway or pedestrian bridge connects two barrier-freestoreys in different buildings, the path of travel from one storey to the other storey by means of the walkway or bridge shall be barrier-free. (See Note A-3.8.2.3.)

Variation Sentence: Windows and doors installed to provide the required means of egress from bedrooms shall conform to part 9.
Full Code Sentence: Windows and doors installed to provide the required means of egress from bedrooms shall conform to Subsection 9.9.10.

Variation Sentence: Manufactured and pre-assembled windows, doors and skylights and their installation shall conform to CSA AAMA/WDMA/CSA 101/I.S.2/A440-11 NAFS North American Fenestration Standard/Specification for Windows, Doors, and Skylights (Harmonized Standard), CSA A440S1-17 Canadian Supplement to AAMA/WDMA/CSA 101/I.S.2/A440-11, NAFS North American Fenestration Standard/Specification for Windows, Doors, and Skylights the remainder of this Subsection, and the applicable requirements in part 9.
Full Code Sentence: Manufactured and pre-assembled windows, doors and skylights and their installation shall conform to CSA AAMA/WDMA/CSA 101/I.S.2/A440-11 NAFS – North American Fenestration Standard/Specification for Windows, Doors, and Skylights (Harmonized Standard), CSA A440S1-17 Canadian Supplement to AAMA/WDMA/CSA 101/I.S.2/A440-11, NAFS – North American Fenestration Standard/Specification for Windows, Doors, and Skylights the remainder of this Subsection, and the applicable requirements in Subsection 9.7.6. (See Note A-9.7.4.2.(1).)

Variation Sentence: A walk-in cooler or freezer consisting of factory-assembled wall, floor or ceiling panels containing foamed plastics is permitted in a building required to be of combustible construction, provided the panels are protected on both sides by sheet metal not less than 0.38 mm thick having a melting point not less than 650°C, do not contain an air space, and when a sample panel with an assembled joint typical of field installation is subjected to the applicable test described in part 3., have a flame-spread rating not more than that permitted for the space in which they are located or the space that they bound, as applicable.
Full Code Sentence: A walk-in cooler or freezer consisting of factory-assembled wall, floor or ceiling panels containing foamed plastics is permitted to be used, provided the panels are protected on both sides by sheet metal not less than 0.38 mm thick having a melting point not less than 650°C, do not contain an air space, and have a flame-spread rating, determined by subjecting a sample panel with an assembled joint typical of field installation to the applicable test described in Subsection 3.1.12., that is not more than that permitted for the room or space in which they are located or that they bound.

Variation Sentence: Where urinals are provided in a barrier-free washroom, at least one urinal shall comply with Subsection 3.8.3.
Full Code Sentence: Where mirrors are provided in a barrier-free washroom, at least one mirror shall comply with Subsection 3.8.3.

Variation Sentence: Fire separations required by Sentences 3.3.1.1. and 3.3.5.9. need not be provided between individual self-service storage units.
Full Code Sentence: Fire separations required by Sentences 3.3.1.1.(1)and 3.3.5.9. need not be provided between individual self-service storage units.

Variation Sentence: Except as provided in Sentences 9.9.7.3. and 9.9.8.2.(2), from the point where a doorway described in Sentence 9.9.7.2. or 9.9.7.2. enters the public corridor or exterior passageway, it shall be possible to go in opposite directions to each of 2 separate exits.
Full Code Sentence: Except as provided in Sentences 9.9.7.3.(1)and 9.9.8.2.(2), from the point where a doorway described in Clause 9.9.7.2.(1)(b)or 9.9.7.2.(1) enters the public corridor or exterior passageway, it shall be possible to go in opposite directions to each of 2 separate exits.

Variation Sentence: Other fenestration assemblies and their components shall be designed and constructed in accordance with part 5.
Full Code Sentence: Other fenestration assemblies and their components shall be designed and constructed in accordance with Section 5.4.

Variation Sentence: Except as provided in Sentence 9.10.15.5.(4), where the limiting distance is equal to or greater than 0.6 m and less than 1.2 m, the exposing building face and any exterior wall located above the exposing building face that encloses an attic or roof space shall have a fire-resistance rating of not less than 45 min, and the cladding shall be metal or noncombustible cladding installed in accordance with Section 9.20., Subsection 9.27.11. or Section 9.28. (see Note A-9.10.14.5.(1)), the cladding shall conform to Subsection 9.27.6., 9.27.7., 9.27.8., 9.27.9, , or 9.27.10., be installed without furring members, or on furring not more than 25 mm thick, over gypsum sheathing at least 12.7 mm thick or over masonry, and after conditioning in conformance with ASTM D 2898-10 Accelerated Weathering of Fire-Retardant-Treated Wood for Fire Testing have a flame-spread rating not greater than 25 when tested in accordance with Sentence 3.1.12.1.(2), the cladding shall conform to Subsection 9.27.12., be installed with or without furring members over gypsum sheathing at least 12.7 mm thick or over masonry, have a flame-spread rating not greater than 25 when tested in accordance with Sentence 3.1.12.1.(2), and not exceed 2 mm in thickness exclusive of fasteners, joints and local reinforcements, or the wall assembly shall comply with Clause 3.1.5.5.(1) when tested in conformance with ULC CAN/ULC-S134-13 Fire Test of Exterior Wall Assemblies
Full Code Sentence: Except as provided in Sentences 9.10.15.5.(4)and 9.10.15.5.(5), where the limiting distance is less than 0.6 m, the exposing building face and exterior walls located above the exposing building face that enclose an attic or roof space shall have a fire-resistance rating of not less than 45 min, and the cladding shall be metal or noncombustible cladding installed in accordance with Section 9.20., 9.27.or 9.28. (see Note A-9.10.14.5.(1)), the cladding shall conform to Subsection 9.27.12., be installed without furring members over gypsum sheathing at least 12.7 mm thick or over masonry, have a flame-spread rating not greater than 25 when tested in accordance with Sentence 3.1.12.1.(2), and not exceed 2 mm in thickness exclusive of fasteners, joints and local reinforcements, or the wall assembly shall comply with Clause 3.1.5.5.(1) when tested in conformance with ULC CAN/ULC-S134-13 Fire Test of Exterior Wall Assemblies

Variation Sentence: Where alterations are made to an existing building, universal washrooms complying with part 3. are permitted to be provided in lieu of facilities for persons with physical disabilities in washrooms used by the general public. (See Note A-3.8.2.8.(1).)
Full Code Sentence: Where alterations are made to an existing building, universal washrooms complying with Subsection 3.8.3. are permitted to be provided in lieu of facilities for persons with physical disabilities in washrooms used by the general public. (See Note A-3.8.2.8. to .)

Variation Sentence: Other fenestration assemblies and their components shall be designed and constructed in accordance with part 5.
Full Code Sentence: Other fenestration assemblies and their components shall be designed and constructed in accordance with Section 5.6.

Variation Sentence: Where buildings are used for occupancies other than those described in Sentence 9.13.4.2.(2), protection from radon ingress and the means to address high radon concentrations in the future shall conform to Article 9.13.4.3., or Parts 5 and 6 (see Article 5.4.1.1. and 6.2.1.1.).
Full Code Sentence: Where buildings are used for occupancies other than those described in Sentence 9.13.4.2.(2), protection from radon ingress and the means to address high radon concentrations in the future shall conform to Article 9.13.4.3., or Parts 5 and 6 (see Article 5.4.1.1.and 6.2.1.1.). (See Note A-9.13.4.2.(3).) (See Note A-9.13.4.3.)

Variation Sentence: The airflow measurements required by Sentence 9.32.3.5. shall be done using a method accurate to within ±15% of the flow rate being measured.
Full Code Sentence: The airflow measurements required by Sentences 9.32.3.4.(3)and 9.32.3.4. shall be done using a method accurate to within ±15% of the flow rate being measured.

Variation Sentence: Other fenestration assemblies and their components shall be designed and constructed in accordance with part 5.
Full Code Sentence: Other fenestration assemblies and their components shall be designed and constructed in accordance with Section 5.6.

Variation Sentence: Suites of residential occupancy equipped with smoke detectors installed to ULC CAN/ULC-S524-14 Installation of Fire Alarm Systems as part of the fire alarm system in lieu of smoke alarms as permitted by Sentence 3.2.4.20.(8), need not incorporate the manually operated device required in Sentence 3.2.4.20.(12). (See Note A-3.2.4.20.(8).)
Full Code Sentence: Suites of residential occupancy equipped with smoke detectors installed to ULC CAN/ULC-S524-14 Installation of Fire Alarm Systems which are part of the fire alarm system in lieu of smoke alarms as permitted in Sentence 9.10.19.4.(3), need not incorporate the manually operated device required in Sentence 9.10.19.6.(1).

Variation Sentence: Other fenestration assemblies and their components shall be designed and constructed in accordance with part 5.
Full Code Sentence: Other fenestration assemblies and their components shall be designed and constructed in accordance with Section 5.4.

Variation Sentence: Except as permitted in Sentences 9.10.18.2. and 9.10.18.2.(4), a fire alarm system shall be installed in buildings in which a sprinkler system is installed.
Full Code Sentence: Except as permitted in Sentences 3.2.4.1.(2)and 3.2.4.1.(3), a fire alarm system shall be installed in buildings in which an automatic sprinkler system is installed.

Variation Sentence: Doorways serving a single dwelling unit or a house with a secondary suite need not comply with Sentence 9.9.6.3.(2). (See also Article 9.5.5.1.)
Full Code Sentence: Doorways serving a single dwelling unit or a house with a secondary suite need not comply with Sentences 9.9.6.2.(1)and 9.9.6.2.(2). (See also Article 9.5.5.1.)

Variation Sentence: Except as required by Sentence 9.10.4.2.(1), the space above a mezzanine is permitted to be excluded from the calculation of building height, provided the aggregate area of mezzanines that are not superimposed does not exceed 40% of the open area of the room in which they are located (see Note A-3.2.1.1.(3)(a)), and except as permitted in Sentence 9.10.4.1.(3), the space above the mezzanine floor is used as an open area without partitions or subdividing walls higher than 1 070 mm above the mezzanine floor.
Full Code Sentence: Except as required by Sentence 3.2.1.1.(5), the space above a mezzanine need not be considered as a storey in calculating the building height, provided the aggregate area of mezzanines that are not superimposed does not exceed 40% of the open area of the room in which they are located (see Note A-3.2.1.1.(3)(a)), and (see Note A-3.2.1.1.(3)(a)), except as permitted in Sentences 3.2.1.1.(7)and 3.3.2.13.(3), the space above the mezzanine is used as an open area without partitions or subdividing walls higher than 1 070 mm above the mezzanine floor.

Variation Sentence: Except as provided in Sentences 9.36.1.3. to 9.36.1.3.(5), buildings shall comply with the prescriptive or trade-off requirements in Subsections 9.36.2. to 9.36.4., the performance requirements in Subsection 9.36.5., or the NECB.
Full Code Sentence: Except as provided in Sentences 9.36.1.3.(2)to 9.36.1.3.(5), buildings shall comply with the prescriptive or trade-off requirements in Subsections 9.36.2.to 9.36.4., the performance requirements in Subsection 9.36.5., or the NECB.

Variation Sentence: Except as provided in Subsections 3. and 3., the storage, handling and use of hazardous substances shall be in conformance with provincial or territorial regulations or municipal bylaws, or in the absence of the regulations or bylaws referred to in Sentence 3.3.1.2.(1), the NFC.
Full Code Sentence: Except as provided in Subsections 3.3.5.and 3.3.6., the storage, handling and use of hazardous substances shall be in conformance with provincial or territorial regulations or municipal bylaws, or in the absence of the regulations or bylaws referred to in Clause 3.3.1.2.(1)(a), the NFC. (See Note A-3.3.1.2.(1).)

Variation Sentence: Except as permitted by Sentences 3.2.2.7. and 3.2.2.7.(4), a building classified as Group F, Division 3 is permitted to conform to Sentence 3.2.2.82. provided except as permitted by Sentences 3.2.2.7. and 3.2.2.18.(2), the building is sprinklered throughout, it is not more than 6 storeys in building height, and it has a building area that is not limited if the building is not more than 1 storey in building height, not more than 21 600 m2 if 2 storeys in building height, not more than 14 400 m2 if 3 storeys in building height, not more than 10 800 m2 if 4 storeys in building height, not more than 8 640 m2 if 5 storeys in building height, or not more than 7 200 m2 if 6 storeys in building height.
Full Code Sentence: A building classified as Group C is permitted to conform to Sentence 3.2.2.51. provided except as permitted by Sentences 3.2.2.7.(1)and 3.2.2.18.(2), the building is sprinklered throughout, it is not more than 4 storeys in building height, and it has a building area not more than 7 200 m2 if 1 storey in building height, 3 600 m2 if 2 storeys in building height, 2 400 m2 if 3 storeys in building height, or 1 800 m2 if 4 storeys in building height.

Variation Sentence: Except as permitted by Sentences 3.2.2.7. and 3.2.2.7.(4), a building classified as Group F, Division 3 is permitted to conform to Sentence 3.2.2.82. provided except as permitted by Sentences 3.2.2.7. and 3.2.2.18.(2), the building is sprinklered throughout, it is not more than 6 storeys in building height, and it has a building area that is not limited if the building is not more than 1 storey in building height, not more than 21 600 m2 if 2 storeys in building height, not more than 14 400 m2 if 3 storeys in building height, not more than 10 800 m2 if 4 storeys in building height, not more than 8 640 m2 if 5 storeys in building height, or not more than 7 200 m2 if 6 storeys in building height.
Full Code Sentence: A building classified as Group C is permitted to conform to Sentence 3.2.2.48. provided except as permitted by Sentences 3.2.2.7.(1)and 3.2.2.18.(2), the building is sprinklered throughout, it is not more than 6 storeys in building height, and it has a building area that is not limited if the building is not more than 2 storeys in building height, not more than 12 000 m2 if 3 storeys in building height, not more than 9 000 m2 if 4 storeys in building height, not more than 7 200 m2 if 5 storeys in building height, or not more than 6 000 m2 if 6 storeys in building height.

Variation Sentence: Where a habitable room or space is not provided with natural ventilation as described in Article 9.32.2.2. and is not mechanically cooled, the non-heating-season mechanical ventilation system shall have the capacity to exhaust indoor air from the room or space or to introduce outdoor air to that room or space at a rate of one air change per hour.
Full Code Sentence: Where a habitable room or space is not provided with natural ventilation as described in Article 9.32.2.2. and is mechanically cooled, its non-heating-season mechanical ventilation system shall have the capacity to exhaust air from inside the room or space, or to introduce outdoor air into that room or space, at a rate conforming with Table 9.32.2.3., or comply with Subsection 9.32.3.

Variation Sentence: Glass for site-built windows, doors, sidelights for doors, and skylights shall comply with part 9.
Full Code Sentence: Glass for site-built windows, doors, sidelights for doors, and skylights shall comply with Section 9.6.

Variation Sentence: Doors in smoke-tight barriers shall be solid-core, wood doors at least 45 mm thick, and have a self-closing device.
Full Code Sentence: Doors in smoke-tight barriers shall be solid-core, wood doors at least 45 mm thick, and have a self-closing device. (See Note A-9.10.9.3.(2).)

Variation Sentence: Ventilation equipment installed in unheated spaces shall be installed so as to avoid condensation of moisture on fans and motors, in accordance with the manufacturers instructions.
Full Code Sentence: Ventilation equipment installed in unheated spaces shall be installed so as to avoid condensation of moisture on fans and motors, in accordance with the manufacturers’ instructions. (See Note A-9.32.3.3.)

Variation Sentence: Except as permitted by Sentences 3.2.2.7. and 3.2.2.7.(4), a building classified as Group F, Division 3 is permitted to conform to Sentence 3.2.2.82. provided except as permitted by Sentences 3.2.2.7. and 3.2.2.18.(2), the building is sprinklered throughout, it is not more than 6 storeys in building height, and it has a building area that is not limited if the building is not more than 1 storey in building height, not more than 21 600 m2 if 2 storeys in building height, not more than 14 400 m2 if 3 storeys in building height, not more than 10 800 m2 if 4 storeys in building height, not more than 8 640 m2 if 5 storeys in building height, or not more than 7 200 m2 if 6 storeys in building height.
Full Code Sentence: A building classified as Group F, Division 3 is permitted to conform to Sentence 3.2.2.86. provided except as permitted by Sentences 3.2.2.7.(1)and 3.2.2.18.(2), the building is sprinklered throughout, it is not more than 2 storeys in building height, and it has a building area not more than 7 200 m2 if 1 storey in building height, or 2 400 m2 if 2 storeys in building height.

Variation Sentence: Except as permitted by Sentences 3.2.2.7. and 3.2.2.7.(4), a building classified as Group F, Division 3 is permitted to conform to Sentence 3.2.2.82. provided except as permitted by Sentences 3.2.2.7. and 3.2.2.18.(2), the building is sprinklered throughout, it is not more than 6 storeys in building height, and it has a building area that is not limited if the building is not more than 1 storey in building height, not more than 21 600 m2 if 2 storeys in building height, not more than 14 400 m2 if 3 storeys in building height, not more than 10 800 m2 if 4 storeys in building height, not more than 8 640 m2 if 5 storeys in building height, or not more than 7 200 m2 if 6 storeys in building height.
Full Code Sentence: A building classified as Group F, Division 1 is permitted to conform to Sentence 3.2.2.71. provided except as permitted by Sentences 3.2.2.7.(1)and 3.2.2.18.(2), the building is sprinklered throughout, it is not more than 3 storeys in building height, and it has a building area not more than 3 600 m2 if 1 storey in building height, 1 800 m2 if 2 storeys in building height, or 1 200 m2 if 3 storeys in building height.

Variation Sentence: A roof-top enclosure provided for elevator machinery, a stairway or a service room used for no purpose other than for service to the building, shall not be considered as a storey in calculating the building height.
Full Code Sentence: Roof-top enclosures provided for elevator machinery, stairways or service rooms, used for no purpose other than for service to the building, shall not be considered as a storey in calculating the building height.

Variation Sentence: Carbon monoxide  alarms required by this Article shall conform to CSA CAN/CSA-6.19-01 Residential Carbon Monoxide Alarming Devices be equipped with an integral alarm that satisfies the audibility requirements of CSA CAN/CSA-6.19-01 Residential Carbon Monoxide Alarming Devices have no disconnect switch between the overcurrent device and the CO alarm, where the CO alarm is powered by the dwelling unit s electrical system, and be mechanically fixed at a height recommended by the manufacturer.
Full Code Sentence: Carbon monoxide  alarms required by this Article shall conform to CSA CAN/CSA-6.19-01 Residential Carbon Monoxide Alarming Devices be equipped with an integral alarm that satisfies the audibility requirements of CSA CAN/CSA-6.19-01 Residential Carbon Monoxide Alarming Devices have no disconnect switch between the overcurrent device and the CO alarm, where the CO alarm is powered by the electrical system serving the suite (see Note A-6.9.3.1.(2)(c)), and be mechanically fixed at a height above the floor as recommended by the manufacturer.

Variation Sentence: For the purpose of compliance with this Code as required in Sentence 1.2.1.1.(1), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 9.37.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)
Full Code Sentence: For the purpose of compliance with this Code as required in Clause 1.2.1.1.(1)(b), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 4.5.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).) (See Note A-5.)

Variation Sentence: For the purposes of compliance with this Code as required in Sentence 1.2.1.1.(1), the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 2.14.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)
Full Code Sentence: For the purposes of compliance with this Code as required in Clause 1.2.1.1.(1) of Division A, the objectives and functional statements attributed to the acceptable solutions in this Part shall be the objectives and functional statements listed in Table 2.8.1.1. (See Note A-1.1.2.1.(1).)

Variation Sentence: Where rectangular duct is used in place of round duct, it shall be selected according to Table 9.32.3.11.-B.
Full Code Sentence: Where rectangular duct is used in place of round duct, it shall be selected according to Table 9.32.3.11.-B. (See Note A-9.32.3.12.)

Variation Sentence: Windows, doors and skylights shall conform to the energy efficiency requirements in part 9.
Full Code Sentence: Windows, doors and skylights shall conform to the energy efficiency requirements in Section 9.36.

Variation Sentence: Compliance with the performance requirements described in Sentences 9.7.3.1. to 9.7.3.1. shall be demonstrated by complying with the requirements in part 9. or 9., and part 9., or design and construction conforming to Part 5.
Full Code Sentence: Compliance with the performance requirements described in Sentences 9.7.3.1.(1)to 9.7.3.1. shall be demonstrated by complying with the requirements in Subsection 9.7.4.or 9.7.5., and Subsection 9.7.6., or design and construction conforming to Part 5.

Variation Sentence: The following systems need not comply with Sentence 5.9.3.4.(2): interior windows and interior doors that do not serve as environmental separators, vehicular access doors (garage doors), storm windows and storm doors, commercial entrance systems, revolving doors, smoke and relief air vents, site-built door systems, and commercial steel doors.
Full Code Sentence: The following systems need not comply with Sentence 5.9.3.5.(2): interior windows and interior doors, vehicular access doors (garage doors), storm windows and storm doors, commercial entrance systems, revolving doors, smoke and relief air vents, site-built door systems, and commercial steel doors. (See Note A-5.9.3.5.(4).)

Variation Sentence: Except as provided in Articles 9.33.5.3. and 9.33.5.4., the installation of heating and air-conditioning equipment, including mechanical refrigeration equipment, and including provisions for mounting, clearances and air supply, shall conform to applicable provincial or territorial regulations or municipal bylaws or, in the absence of such regulations or bylaws, to CSA B51-14 Boiler, Pressure Vessel, and Pressure Piping Code CSA B52-13 Mechanical Refrigeration Code CSA B139-09 Installation Code for Oil-Burning Equipment CSA B149.1-10 Natural Gas and Propane Installation Code CSA C22.1-12 Canadian Electrical Code, Part I or CSA C448 Series-13 Design and Installation of Earth Energy Systems
Full Code Sentence: Except as provided in Articles 6.9.4.2. and Article 6.3.1.5., the installation of heating and air-conditioning equipment, including mechanical refrigeration equipment, and including provisions for mounting, clearances and air supply, shall conform to appropriate provincial or territorial requirements or, in the absence of such requirements, to the requirements of CSA B51-14 Boiler, Pressure Vessel, and Pressure Piping Code CSA B52-13 Mechanical Refrigeration Code CSA B139-09 Installation Code for Oil-Burning Equipment CSA B149.1-10 Natural Gas and Propane Installation Code CSA B365-17 Installation Code for Solid-Fuel-Burning Appliances and Equipment or CSA C22.1-12 Canadian Electrical Code, Part I

Variation Sentence: Except as permitted by Sentences 3.2.2.7. and 3.2.2.7.(4), a building classified as Group F, Division 3 is permitted to conform to Sentence 3.2.2.82. provided except as permitted by Sentences 3.2.2.7. and 3.2.2.18.(2), the building is sprinklered throughout, it is not more than 6 storeys in building height, and it has a building area that is not limited if the building is not more than 1 storey in building height, not more than 21 600 m2 if 2 storeys in building height, not more than 14 400 m2 if 3 storeys in building height, not more than 10 800 m2 if 4 storeys in building height, not more than 8 640 m2 if 5 storeys in building height, or not more than 7 200 m2 if 6 storeys in building height.
Full Code Sentence: A building classified as Group B, Division 1 is permitted to conform to Sentence 3.2.2.37. provided except as permitted by Sentences 3.2.2.7.(1)and 3.2.2.18.(2), the building is sprinklered throughout, it is not more than 3 storeys in building height, and it has a building area that is not limited if the building is not more than 1 storey in building height, not more than 12 000 m2 if 2 storeys in building height, or not more than 8 000 m2 if 3 storeys in building height.

Variation Sentence: Except as permitted by Sentences 3.2.2.7. and 3.2.2.7.(4), a building classified as Group F, Division 3 is permitted to conform to Sentence 3.2.2.82. provided except as permitted by Sentences 3.2.2.7. and 3.2.2.18.(2), the building is sprinklered throughout, it is not more than 6 storeys in building height, and it has a building area that is not limited if the building is not more than 1 storey in building height, not more than 21 600 m2 if 2 storeys in building height, not more than 14 400 m2 if 3 storeys in building height, not more than 10 800 m2 if 4 storeys in building height, not more than 8 640 m2 if 5 storeys in building height, or not more than 7 200 m2 if 6 storeys in building height.
Full Code Sentence: A building classified as Group B, Division 2 is permitted to conform to Sentence 3.2.2.39. provided except as permitted by Sentences 3.2.2.7.(1)and 3.2.2.18.(2), the building is sprinklered throughout, it is not more than 3 storeys in building height, and it has a building area that is not limited if the building is not more than 1 storey in building height, not more than 12 000 m2 if 2 storeys in building height, or not more than 8 000 m2 if 3 storeys in building height.

Variation Sentence: Except for dwelling units in a house with a secondary suite, a dwelling unit shall be provided with a second and separate means of egress where an egress door from the dwelling unit opens onto an exit stairway serving more than one suite, a public corridor serving more than one suite, and served by a single exit, an exterior passageway serving more than one suite, served by a single exit stairway or ramp, and more than 1.5 m above adjacent ground level, or a balcony serving more than one suite, served by a single exit stairway or ramp, and more than 1.5 m above adjacent ground level.
Full Code Sentence: Where a dwelling unit is located above another dwelling unit or common space in a house with a secondary suite, the upper dwelling unit shall be provided with a second and separate means of egress where an egress door from that dwelling unit opens onto an exterior passageway that has a floor assembly with a fire-resistance rating less than 45 min, is served by a single exit stairway or ramp, and is located more than 1.5 m above adjacent ground level.

Variation Sentence: A building that is wholly constructed in accordance with the building area and construction requirements of Article 3.2.2.50. shall not contain Group A, Division 2 and Group E major occupancies above the second storey, or a storage garage above the third storey (see also Sentence 4.4.2.1.(1)).

Variation Sentence: Except as permitted by Sentences 3.2.2.7. and 3.2.2.7.(4), a building classified as Group F, Division 3 is permitted to conform to Sentence 3.2.2.82. provided except as permitted by Sentences 3.2.2.7. and 3.2.2.18.(2), the building is sprinklered throughout, it is not more than 6 storeys in building height, and it has a building area that is not limited if the building is not more than 1 storey in building height, not more than 21 600 m2 if 2 storeys in building height, not more than 14 400 m2 if 3 storeys in building height, not more than 10 800 m2 if 4 storeys in building height, not more than 8 640 m2 if 5 storeys in building height, or not more than 7 200 m2 if 6 storeys in building height.
